sqlMap.sql: SELECT mb.member_name, mb.member_email, mt.mentor_no, mt.mentor_intro, mt.mentor_etc, mt.mentor_image, mt.mentor_university, mt.mentor_carrer, mt.mentor_job
sqlMap.select: FROM MENTOR mt INNER JOIN MEMBER mb ON mt.member_no = mb.member_no ORDER BY mt.mentor_no DESC
FROM MENTOR mt INNER JOIN MEMBER mb ON mt.member_no = mb.member_no AND mt.mentor_no = #mentor_no#
FROM MENTOR mt INNER JOIN MEMBER mb ON mt.member_no = mb.member_no AND mb.member_name like #searchKeyword# ORDER BY mt.mentor_no DESC
FROM MENTOR mt INNER JOIN MEMBER mb ON mt.member_no = mb.member_no AND mt.mentor_carrer like #searchKeyword# ORDER BY mt.mentor_no DESC
FROM MENTOR mt INNER JOIN MEMBER mb ON mt.member_no = mb.member_no AND mt.mentor_no = #mentor_no#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO MENTOR (MENTOR_NO, MEMBER_NO, MENTOR_INTRO, MENTOR_ETC, MENTOR_IMAGE, MENTOR_UNIVERSITY, MENTOR_CARRER, MENTOR_JOB ) VALUES (MENTOR_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, MEMBER_NO_SEQ.CURRVAL, #mentor_intro#, #mentor_etc#, #mentor_image#, #mentor_university#, #mentor_carrer#, #mentor_job# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE MENTOR SET MENTOR_INTRO = #mentor_intro#, MENTOR_ETC = #mentor_etc#, MENTOR_IMAGE = #mentor_image#, MENTOR_UNIVERSITY = #mentor_university#, MENTOR_CARRER = #mentor_carrer#, MENTOR_JOB = #mentor_job#
